US military's secretive X-37B spaceplane ready for launch to higher orbitSpaceX teams prepared again on Thursday to launch the military's X-37B robot spaceplane on its seventh mission. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 15:03:27 GMT S6V2QDBQU5PLHKRMFDCOLIEXJU https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/us-military-secretive-x-37b-spaceplane-ready-launch-higher-orbit-2023-12-28/Joey Roulette, Steve Gorman商业航空航天与国防
Former China central bank official jailed for 16 years for graft - CaixinA former Chinese central bank official has been sentenced to 16 years and six months in prison for taking bribes, leaking state secrets and insider trading as the ruling Communist Party tightens its grip on the financial sector. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:45:46 GMT RA7QAUVW6BK5NBHRVQ43EKDLKI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/former-china-central-bank-officially-jailed-16-years-graft-caixin-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中国
What and where are Russia's $300 billion in reserves frozen in the West?After President Vladimir Putin sent troops into Ukraine in 2022, the United States and its allies prohibited transactions with Russia's central bank and finance ministry, blocking around $300 billion of sovereign Russian assets in the West. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:27:24 GMT XTTVIYIVTFPJ7BW25UNTZAV33Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/what-where-are- Russia-300-billion-reserves-frozen-west-2023-12-28/Elena Fabrichnaya, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
China's military lashes out at US after breakthrough talksChina's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:50:14 GMT UJEWN6HLKFODRG32LXNKQXTRJU https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-military-lashes-out-us-after-breakthrough-talks-2023-12-28/Laurie Chen世界
Gold steadies after hitting three-week high as US yields tick upGold prices steadied on Thursday, after hitting a more than three-week high earlier, as an uptick in U.S. bond yields undermined the support from expectations of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve early next year. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:22:05 GMT BRFI2CRK4ZP6DNDH345SFZQX4A https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/gold-climbs-over-third-week-high-us-rate-cuts-bets-2023-12-28/Anjana Anil市场商品
China aims to build more than half the world's cleaner-fuel ships by 2025China has set itself the goal of producing more than half of the world's ships powered by cleaner fuels by 2025, in guidelines published by the industry ministry on Thursday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 10:00:47 GMT N4774W7AVVLAFC7BU7WKGOJRYQ https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/china-aims-to-build-over-half-worlds-clean-fuel-powered-ships-by-2025-2023-12-28/Reuters可持续发展
